actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to change the name of the Committee on International Relations to the Committee on Foreign Affairs.

summary.text: Amends the Rules of the House of Representatives to change the name of the Committee on International Relations to the Committee on Foreign Affairs.

titles.title: Resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to change the name of the Committee on International Relations to the Committee on Foreign Affairs.
